thread.section_title: Shangri-La Hotel Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Historical Hotel -
thread.title_full: Historical Hotel - Review of Shangri-La Hotel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Saye40
title: Historical Hotel -
text:
I spent 6 days at Shangri -La hotel in Paris.
Very nicely located near Trocadero.
Wonderful view from the room on the eiffel tower.
The lobby and other halls are amazing. It is a historical monument.
The main weakness of the hotel is their room. They are not st the level of a such palace. The rooms are equivalent to 4stars hotel.
The service of reception is weak .
-However the day team of concierges are excellent. The chief Toni is highly qualified.
Bastien , Julien and Anthony are excellent concierges
The main strength of this hotel is the food they offer in their restaurants
I have tried la Bauhimia where you take your breakfastexcell
They offer a very nice choice of asiatic and French dishes.
Value for money is in their restaurants.
The executive Chef Moret prepare an excellent sole and Burrata
The asiatic restaurant Shang Palace has a one star at Michelin guide. You should try the crispy duck.
Finally the spa is wonderful.
Superb pool with view.
The masseur Fernando is excellent and very funny.
